LOCALS_DEF.item: *"* use this source file for any type of declarations (class
*"* definitions, interfaces or type declarations) you need for

LOCALS_IMP.item: *"* use this source file for the definition and implementation of
*"* local helper classes, interface definitions and type
constructor IMPORTING io_sender TYPE REF TO zcl_bc_program_base_2
on_user_command FOR EVENT added_function OF cl_salv_events IMPORTI
handle_finished FOR EVENT finished OF cl_gui_timer.
DATA: go_sender TYPE REF TO zcl_bc_program_base_2,
DATA: lo_selections TYPE REF TO cl_salv_selections,

LOCALS_MAC.item: *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need
*"* in the implementation part of the class

RESET_SEL_REQ_FIELD.item: READ TABLE gt_sel_req_fields INTO DATA(ls_sel_req_field) WITH KEY field = iv_field.
MODIFY gt_sel_req_fields FROM ls_sel_req_field INDEX sy-tabix.
* READ TABLE lt_text INTO DATA(ls_text) WITH KEY key = ls_sel_req_field-field.

SET_SELECTIONS.item: DATA: ldref TYPE REF TO data,
" definire classe eccezione e lanciare eccezione
RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zcx_bc_exception MESSAGE s398(00) WITH 'parameter' ls_par-selname 'must be defined in' cl_abap_classdescr=>get_class_name( me ).
CREATE DATA ldref LIKE LINE OF <lt_par>.
" definire classe eccezione e lanciare eccezione
RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zcx_bc_exception MESSAGE s398(00) WITH 'select-option' ls_par-selname 'must be defined in' cl_abap_classdescr=>get_class_name( me ).

SET_SEL_REQ_FIELD.item: DATA: lt_text TYPE TABLE OF textpool.
READ TEXTPOOL gv_program INTO lt_text LANGUAGE gv_language.
READ TABLE gt_sel_req_fields INTO DATA(ls_sel_req_field) WITH KEY field = iv_field.
MODIFY gt_sel_req_fields FROM ls_sel_req_field INDEX sy-tabix.
READ TABLE lt_text INTO DATA(ls_text) WITH KEY key = ls_sel_req_field-field.

ALV_CREATE.item: DATA lo_display TYPE REF TO cl_salv_display_settings.
DATA: lo_columns TYPE REF TO cl_salv_columns_list.

ALV_SHOW.item: DATA : lo_selections TYPE REF TO cl_salv_selections,

SET_DATA.item: DATA: lo_struct_descr TYPE REF TO cl_abap_structdescr,
CREATE DATA ls_table TYPE HANDLE lo_struct_descr.
CREATE DATA lt_table TYPE HANDLE lo_table_descr.
